Q.1. IMF chief Kristalina Georgieva confirmed the world economy was already sluggish before the coronavirus outbreak now bound to suffer a "severe recession" in 2020. Where is headquaters of IMF?
Q.2. US President Donald Trump unveiled a three-phase plan to reopen the country's economy following the COVID-19 outbreak. Which of the following countries have maximum confirmed cases?
Q.3. Home Ministry extended regular and e-visas of all foreigners who are stranded in India due to the coronavirus lockdown till which date on a gratis basis?
Q.4. Dubai's Supreme Committee of Crisis and Disaster Management announced the extension of the 24-hour National Sterilisation Programme for how much time?

Q.5. Union Health Minister Dr. Harsh Vardhan had a detailed meeting with medical officials with Delhi Medical Superintendents of various hospitals in New Delhi. Who is current Health Minister of Delhi?
Q.6. Civil Service Day is observed on which of the following days?
Q.7. RBI announced to increase the advance limit from Rs 1.2 lakh crore to how many lakh crore rupees for the remaining part of the first half of FY 2020-21?
Q.8. How many companies have been selected by the Department of Biological Technology (DBT), which will be funded to develop the Kovid-19 vaccine?
Q.9. Which of the following is the first green state in the country which does not have cases of corono virus?
Q.10. Which link has been launched by Road Transport Ministry for the list of Dhabas and truck repair shops on its website?
Q.11. What is name of mascot for the 4th Asian Para Games at Hangzhou, China in October 2022?
Q.12. RBI raises Ways and Means Advances limit for States by how much percent over and above the level as on 31 March 2020?
Q.13. World Heritage Day is celebrated on which date?
Q.14. Around 40 Indian business representatives logged on to a first-of-its-kind virtual roundtable organized by the Indian High Commission in London. Who is prime minister of UK?
Q.15. Which institute designs 'WardBot' to deliver food, medicines to COVID-19 patients in isolation wards without human intervention?
Q.16. Which country termed the changes in FDI policy by India as a violation of WTO principles?
Q.17. How many inter-ministerial teams were formed by the central government to assess the situation and effectively prevent COVID-19?
Q.18. Which of the following company has developed the 'Talkback' keyboard for the visually impaired?
Q.19. Recently a petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to direct which state government to conduct COVID-19 test among the tribal population residing in Godavari river valley area?
Q.20. Recently who has been appointed the secretary of President Ramnath Kovind?
Q.21. Central Drug Standard Control Organisation (CDSCO) has approved how many Indian firms for antibody rapid testing kits for testing COVID-19?
